markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48)

**Prerequisites**
[Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752); Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); Trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You've trained to assassinate your foes, and you do so with tenacity and precision. You gain the Mark for Death activity.

<document level="2" id="action-565" />

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the assassin archetype.

<title level="2">Assassin Dedication leads to...</title>
[Angel of Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=1893), [Angel of Vindication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3612), [Assassinate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1894), [Eclipsed Vitality](/Feats.aspx?ID=3613), [Expert Backstabber](/Feats.aspx?ID=1891), [Public Execution](/Feats.aspx?ID=4143), [Surprise Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=1892)
name: Assassin Dedication
prerequisite: Alchemical Crafting; Trained in Crafting; Trained in Deception; Trained in Stealth
